title: Study of Michelangelo's Night Sculpture from the Medici Tombs
marks:
Inscription

recto, at lower right, in pen and b
description: partially reclining figure of a very muscular nude woman with upper body twisted to PL; PR elbow on outside of PL thigh; PL lower arm, PR leg and PL foot not differentiated--hair and PL hand faintly sketched; four O\'s in brown ink, LRC
